name: Restaurant-Test-Page (Practice project)
des: Restaurant Test Project is a practice project I built to enhance my skills in React and responsive design. It features user-friendly navigation, customizable sections, and a responsive interface tailored for restaurant management. This project reflects my expertise in modern web development.

name: Ostad-Wordpress-Page (Practice project)
des: Ostad Page is a practice project designed to enhance my skills in React and responsive web design. It features a clean, modern layout with customizable sections, user-friendly navigation, and a fully responsive interface. The project focuses on creating dynamic, functional web pages that adapt seamlessly to different devices. It reflects my commitment to mastering modern web development and delivering a professional, visually appealing design.

name: Build-Craft
des: A modern e-commerce platform with a wide range of products.

name: Tour-Palic
des: Tour Palic is an innovative tour agent management system designed to simplify the process of managing and exploring tour spots. Users can effortlessly add new tour spots, categorize them, and explore existing destinations by country. This platform provides an intuitive interface for users to discover exciting travel locations and helps tour agents manage spots efficiently. With its user-friendly design and powerful tools, Tour Palic makes it easy to organize and plan tours, catering to both individual travelers and tour agencies. Whether you're an adventurer seeking inspiration or an agent managing destinations, Tour Palic is your ultimate travel management solution.

name: Serene-Stays
des: Serene Stays is a comprehensive hotel booking management system designed to simplify and enhance the process of booking accommodations. This website provides an intuitive platform for guests to explore room options, check availability, and make reservations effortlessly. It offers advanced tools for hotel administrators to manage room bookings, track guest details, and handle future reservations with ease. Whether you're traveling for leisure or managing hospitality operations, Serene Stays is your go-to solution for efficient hotel booking management.

name: Bistro-Boss-Restaurant
des: Bistro Boss Restaurant is a dynamic online food ordering platform designed to streamline the process of managing food orders efficiently. This website offers a user-friendly interface for customers to explore diverse menu options, place orders seamlessly, and enjoy a hassle-free dining experience. For restaurant administrators, it provides robust tools to monitor orders, update menus, and manage customer interactions. Whether you're craving delicious meals or looking to optimize your restaurant's operations, Bistro Boss Restaurant is the ultimate solution for online food ordering and management.

name: Core-Bits
des: Core-Bits is a subscription-based web application designed to streamline asset and product management for businesses. Tailored for HR managers, it categorizes company assets into Returnable (like laptops and chairs) and Non-returnable (like pens and tissue paper), making it easy to monitor allocation, usage, and status. Core-Bits ensures efficient resource management and boosts operational productivity.
